JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Pavlina Panova;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE and DATE respectively and live in GPE . They are a father and his son .

CARDINAL . In DATE the first applicant and his wife bought from the ORG , through ORG , an apartment of QUANTITY in the centre of GPE . The apartment had become ORG property by virtue of the nationalisations carried out by the communist regime in GPE in DATE and DATE . It had been a part of a bigger apartment , which had on an unspecified date before DATE been divided into CARDINAL smaller ones .
CARDINAL . In DATE the heirs of the former pre - nationalisation owner of the property brought proceedings against the first applicant and his wife under section CARDINAL of LAW .
CARDINAL . In DATE the first applicant ’s wife died and was inherited by the CARDINAL applicants .

CARDINAL . The proceedings under section CARDINAL of LAW ended by final judgment of ORG . The courts found that the ORG title was null and void because the division of the initial bigger apartment into CARDINAL smaller ones ( see paragraph CARDINAL above ) had not been carried out in accordance with the law .

CARDINAL . NORP Immediately after the final judgment in their case , it became possible for the applicants to obtain compensation from the State , in the form of bonds which could be used in privatisation tenders or sold to brokers . The applicants did not avail themselves of this opportunity .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the heirs of the former owner of the apartment brought a rei vindicatio action and an action for damages against the first applicant who was still living in the apartment . The proceedings are still pending . The first applicant ’s request to be accommodated in a municipallyowned dwelling , lodged in DATE , has not yet been granted due to the unavailability of free apartments .

CARDINAL . These have been summarised in the ORG s judgment in the case of ORG and Others v. GPE , nos . CARDINAL , ORG , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , GPE , CARDINAL/CARDINAL , ORG , and CARDINAL , DATE .
